name: Counter SWAT Sniper Shooter Strike Games 3d
name_original: Counter SWAT Sniper Shooter Strike Games 3d
description:
Military Sniper Strike Attack is an awesome 3d action pack games for army sniper game lovers.
Enjoy modern sniper shooting games at its best. Get close aiming contact with the enemy and Shoot the criminals from hidden positions that exceeds the detection capabilities of your enemy.
The nation needs your help; your goal is simple aim and shoot the criminals and prisoners that escaped from the prison.

With ten(10) different assault operations, your duty is unique in your own army. The game gives you the full pack of sniper missions to experience on your mobile device.

Hold your breath and pull the trigger of your sniper rifle in this real-life 3D-graphics and sound environment, the army operation gives an healthy experience to carry out this mission. To a reasonable use of limited ammunition, kill crazy criminals, they have the opportunity to focus on you.

Game Features:
- Be a sharp army sniper
- Each level contains a simple operation on criminals.
- Easy and user friendly controls
- Special aiming zoom features for precision killings.
- Realistic game sound effects.
